content:
Please note that the target audience is logistics managers 
the theme of the pillar page will be lean production
the pillar page will link to the following articles:

{use each of the blog titles from the rss feed provided earlier} 

Using this information, using the best practice outlined below consider and develop a pillar page content strategy. I want you to give me an overview of the pillar page, summarise the main theme and aims of the page, as well as to create a markdown table formatted outline of hwo the pillar page should be structured.

The markdown table should include the columns:
1 - title of the section
2 - overview of what the section is about
3 - articles to link to from the options above
4 - key themes and ideas that should be included in this section
5 - high volume target keywords

Please ensure each blog from the rss feed is used at least once
